description: Dante takes a beating and keeps on ticking. He's always eager to come back for more, and this time the new dom Colin Steele wants to know why. Colin takes Dante to the BoundGods Bondage Wall for him to pick out his own "toys" for the day. Dante selects several items including a flogger, a paddle, and some clothespins. After spending sometime exploring Dante's head, Colin pushes Dante's limits to the max with the huge wooden cane and the cattle prod -- items that Dante didn't choose. To make things worse, Colin ties him up and cockteases him for the longest time... taking him to the edge over and over again. Colin closes the day with a hellacious bondage fuck.
title: Deconstructing Dante
